body_html:
@anandh02 - Hi, can you please answer the following.

  1. Have you installed gpu version of tensorflow ?(i.e pip install tensorflow-gpu)
  2. If so, please run below test and see if it's true.
    tf.test.is_gpu_available(
    cuda_only=False,
    min_cuda_compute_capability=None
    )
  3. Install Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable Update 3
  4. Use Cuda 9 and cuDNN 7 versions
  5. Try your code again and see if you are running into the same GPU error. Also please paste the complete error here.

Please try above steps and keep posted here. Thank you !

Please try above steps and keep posted here. Thank you !
body:
@anandh02  -  Hi, can you please answer the following.

1) Have you installed gpu version of tensorflow ?(i.e pip install tensorflow-gpu)
2) If so, please run below test and see if it's true.
**_tf.test.is_gpu_available(
    cuda_only=False,
    min_cuda_compute_capability=None
)_**
3) Install Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable Update 3
4) Use Cuda 9 and cuDNN 7 versions
5) Try your code again and see if you are running into the same GPU error. Also please paste the complete error here.

Please try above steps and keep posted here. Thank you !
